title: Personalized Activity Monitoring for Enhanced Patient Care
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to monitor my patients' health metrics and receive alerts for any anomalies so that I can provide timely interventions and support their well-being.

title: Guided Exercise Reminders for Elderly Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide guided exercise reminders for my patients so that I can support their physical health and encourage regular activity even when I am not present.

title: Virtual Coaching for Patient Engagement in Physical and Cognitive Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to provide virtual coaching for my patients to engage them in physical and cognitive activities so that I can promote their health and well-being, even when I am not physically present.
